trans-unit.source: Reporting
Debugging/Logging
Storage PID: Enter default page uid for storing imported records.
Log storage PID: Enter page uid for storing log entries (default is 0).
Force time limit (seconds): Change the maximun execution time for the import process. Defaut time limit is used if value = -1. See the manual for more details.

Email for reporting (multiple addresses separated by comma): When the import is executed automatically, you may receive a report about the execution if you set an email address (leave blank for no report).
Subject of email report: Set a subject for the email report. Additional information will be appended to that subject (i.e. "Full synchronization" ou "Synchronization of table x, index y").
Preview/Debug limit: The number of rows to show while doing a preview. Set to 0 for showing all. This also affects the debugging output.
Debug: Check to turn on debugging (output depends on TYPO3 version and context; check the documentation).
Disable logging: Check to disable logging by TCEmain. Recommended if you don't need to keep close track of the import process.
